attributes.action: To make it compulsory for all road traffic to be driven with their headlights on at all times during winter time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many winter days are overcast and grey,a lot of accidents are caused because road vehicles of certain colours are not seen because they blend into the background,road vehicles with their headlights on are sure to be more noticeable.
I am sure that this action WOULD save lives.
